author: sambacha
content: I send a transaction to the networki == order for inclusion in a block, with gwei being my bid and the miner willingness to process that order at my proposed transaction fee is the ask

content: I was curious as to see if there was a way to collect data on user transaction submissions that are cancelled, i.e. they send in a replacement transaction
